page.title: 15Local Events Brockhampton
page.content: {Whitbourne Village Below you can see some of the events that take place in{Whitbourne}village. Most of the functions take place in The Coronation Hall. {Regular Events Occasional Events Youth Club Cookery Classes Women's Institute Wedding Receptions Committee meetings Whist Drives Brownies Dances Keep_fit Disco Playschool Jumble Sales Monday Club Flea Market Gardening Club Parties Mr Chig's Choir Plays Prize Giving Brownies Staying Fashion Shows Flower Shows Bingo Auctions Voting
